backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining surgery case types, user profiles, access control, and CRUD methods including case creation with todo items.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to their high-level functional descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/generateProjectFilesMan: Node script that recursively scans the project, filters excluded patterns, and outputs a manifest JSON of all project files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, authentication gating, auto-role provisioning, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth with full React Query cache clearing and logout cleanup.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Placeholder component file with no implementation content.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Renders a case creation/edit form with auto-fill, MRN duplicate detection, and numerous patient and status fields using react-hook-form.
frontend/src/components/cases/QuickAddDe: Provides a demographics quick‑add tool that parses pasted or OCR-extracted text and lets users edit and apply parsed values.
frontend/src/components/cases/ToDoSectio: Displays and manages a case‑specific to‑do list with add, toggle, and delete actions linked to backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/debug/DebugPanel: Shows debugging info including identity, actor status, role, case stats, and stopped‑canister diagnostics with refresh and copy utilities.
frontend/src/components/debug/ProjectFil: Loads and filters a project file manifest, showing results with copy-to-clipboard support and basic error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, footer, offline sync, and an optional debug panel tied to user identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with branding, login controls, offline indicator, and optional debug toggle.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: UI popover button showing online/offline status, pending offline operations, and manual sync controls.
Loads pending offline operations on mount using the offline sync hook.
frontend/src/components/offline/PendingC: Dialog listing pending offline operations with labels, statuses, retry and clear options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRoleDebug.ts: Queries the backend for the caller's role for debugging, with optional polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRoleProv: Automatically provisions the user role after login with retries and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via navigator and window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineSync.ts: Handles loading and syncing queued offline operations with the backend actor once online, updating operation status and clearing successful entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjectFilesManife: Fetches and validates a static manifest listing project files for build inspection using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProvisioningStatus: Tracks provisioning progress of user role setup, exposing state, retries, errors, and timing for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for case CRUD operations with offline caching and offline-queue fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a light/dark theme using custom CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays and edits a single case with offline fallbacks, update/delete actions, and cached data support.
frontend/src/pages/CaseListPage.tsx: Shows searchable, sortable case lists with offline indicators and supports import/export operations.
frontend/src/pages/NewCasePage.tsx: Renders the new case creation page with a form and handles submitting a create-case mutation with offline support.
frontend/src/types/offlineOps.ts: Defines TypeScript types for queued offline operations related to surgery cases and todos.
frontend/src/utils/caseMatching.ts: Provides a function to find the most recent case for a given MRN by sorting matching cases.
frontend/src/utils/dateTime.ts: Utility functions for converting between Date objects, HTML date strings, and backend bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsParser.ts: Parses free‑text demographics into structured fields, tracking missing and uncertain values.
frontend/src/utils/icStoppedCanisterErro: Detects stopped‑canister errors, extracts canister IDs, and generates related messages.
frontend/src/utils/logoutCleanup.ts: Performs best‑effort cleanup of offline cache and queued operations during logout.
frontend/src/utils/ocrText.ts: Implements client‑side OCR using the TextDetector API with fallbacks and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/offlineDb.ts: Manages IndexedDB storage for cached case lists, individual cases, and operation queue entries.
frontend/src/utils/offlineQueue.ts: Provides functions to enqueue, query, update, and clear offline queued operations in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/utils/safeErrorMessage.ts: Converts unknown error values into a safe, user‑displayable string.
Parses CSV rows for surgery cases, including field normalization, enum parsing, boolean handling, and CSV line parsing with quotes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, clear, and persist URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing schema versions, features, and configuration for DebugPanel improvements.
